enhanced_description: PyjamaHR is a forever-FREE applicant tracking system (ATS) and comprehensive recruitment software developed by FullThrottle Labs Pvt. Ltd. It is designed to address key pain points and challenges faced by recruitment teams globally, trusted by over 5000 businesses. The platform leverages AI-powered sourcing and seamless integrations to help organizations efficiently find and onboard qualified candidates. PyjamaHR also facilitates remote work opportunities by connecting professionals with a global job marketplace and assists companies in showcasing their remote work culture through employer branding, potentially via social media channels like LinkedIn.
